Reviews.Author: J. Ray "augie's mom"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my son to take to boyscout camp-- He loves it!!! He really likes the focusing & quality of the pictures.  PLUS-- I could not find it for 3 weeks-- finally my son told me it was in the fishing boat. OH no!! I found it submerged under rainwater I took it out,dried it off-- and it turned on!!! It works great!!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: C. Shelton
Reviews.Content: I've only had the camera for about a week, but I've tested it in a bucket of water (it was raining the first day I received it) and went to the beach the next day to test. In the bucket it took great pictures of a penny and at the beach it took great pictures of the very small shells on the bottom of the ocean. I also tested to see if you left the setting on "underwater" and forgot to change, would the pictures be OK. They were fine. The water was still a little churned up the next day, but it also took amazing pictures of my foot.(Not much else on the beach floor in Boynton).Went to Peanut Island yesterday and snorkeled--clear water--really good pictures. I will have to say the pictures taken indoors are a little grainy looking, but that's not what I bought the camera for. If you're looking for a camera that's safe in and around the water, this is the best one available in the price range.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, know limits
Reviews.Author: Benson C. Look
Reviews.Content: I wanted a durable underwater / beach camera for a trip to Hawaii and didn't want to spend a lot of money.  I had used a cheap used 5 Meg pixel camera in an underwater pouch before.  Worked great, but the sand and salt destroyed to camera.  I decided give this camera a try.The first one was defective.  I sent it back to Fujifilm for warranty repair.  To their credit they simply replaced the camera.Pros:Small and easy to carry.I like the push button setup.  Easy to learn and gets you quickly to where you want to go.Videos were clear and made capturing some fun underwater moments of my kids and nieces.  Just need to remember to prefocus before shooting videos.  Focus on something in the distance and maintain relative distance from the subject and it comes out great.  Beach videos clear with good sound capture.  Videos of us snorkeling in deep water off Lanai and in Pupukea on Oahu were fantastic for the small lens of this camera.Cons:Need to add a wrist flotation device.  I found a good bright orange one that works.  Caution read the reviews; there are similar looking ones that aren't buoyant enough to hold it up.  I found this one on E-bay from an Australian merchant.Also the wrist strap got in the way when we went kayaking.  It keeps hitting the side of the kayak.  I was worried that it damage the camera or breaks off.  Need to add a neck strap as well.  This kind of camera needs quick and easy access to take pictures and not worry about environment around it.  Too hard to keep in pocket when kayaking.In bright light the display screen is nearly useless.  I had an old Minolta 35 mm underwater camera years ago.  It was bright yellow floated and had a strap on aiming target.  Would like to see some thing similar to help line up the camera to what you are photographing.Would like a dedicated button to switch between underwater and surface shooting modes.  It is a menu selection, but since this is an underwater camera, it would be handy to switch back and forth directly.Side note, I am very careful about rinsing the camera clean before opening the bottom.  But on one beach (Kailua) the sand is very fine.  It sounds like some got inside the under cover slider.  I can hear a grinding sound I haven't heard before.  Hopefully this will not affect the water tightness of the camera.

Reviews.Title: Not to shabby
Reviews.Author: CJ's Mommy
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera when my son was born because I didn't want to have to worry about water damage for bath time pictures.It's a nice little camera. We take it in the pool with us and haven't had any issues with it.

Reviews.Title: Late model, but worth saving the money for a specialty camera.
Reviews.Author: C. Hiss
Reviews.Content: I wanted a camera I could use at the beach or pool without having to worry about getting any water or sand in it.  I borrowed a "waterproof" camera from a friend, and was pleased with the functionality of it.  So, the wife and I decided we would be better off taking a waterproof camera to various locations that were not suited for our higher end camera.So, after reading reviews of all the other waterproof cameras, it was clear that none are perfect, and none of them take the best photos, whether above or below the water.  I don't publish my pictures in any art galleries or magazines...I just want to capture moments of myself and my family having a good time at the beach or pool.With that said, I have used this thing twice at the pool, and it takes GREAT pictures...given the fact that it was submerged underwater most of the time.  There aren't any "o-rings", but I am sure replacing the foam gasket at the SINGLE opening (that allows for battery, PC connection, and computer upload) after frequent use, will ensure peace-of-mind when you walk to the beach or enter the water.  There is no sliding door to protect the lens, but that is a good thing.  I would hate to have a lens protector slide up and down every time I turned it on...if it had a piece of sand trapped in it.  Buy a case to protect the lens and LCD screen when you aren't using it!If you want a camera that is for fun, save your time and money and get it while it's still available.  It's at a price where it is used only when you don't want your better camera to be exposed to...and still takes great you can share with your friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Good Little Camera for its low price
Reviews.Author: Spettitt
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my trip to Hawaii since I did not want to bring my expensive DSLR plus I wanted something that I could use underwater.  The camera is not bad for the price.  The camera took better video and picture quality then I would of expected.  I liked that the camera was very small and easy to use.  I would highly recommend this camera if you are going on a vacation that you know you are going to go snorkeling or if you want to use it in your pool.  The video setting was my favorite when it came to using this camera and I loved the sunset setting also.Link to my Youtube account which all videos from Hawaii I used this camera (Videos: Manta Rays, Eels, Atlantis Submarine and Royal Kona Resort Luau):[...]

Reviews.Title: MY DAUGHTER LOVES THIS CAMERA!
Reviews.Author: D. Stoner "Kenikelani"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera back in December for Christmas for my teen daughter. Went to Cancun right after Christmas and she loved taking photos in the pool and at the beach. Also nice for boating trips and swim parties! She loves the "easy video" button and the fact that she can charge her battery and not worry about AA's. We also had fun taking photos in the rain in Paris. Overall a great camera. And it was less expensive on Amazon than in Target - BTW, Target does not sell this camera in Pink.

Reviews.Title: Great Waterproof Camera
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: This is a great little "waterproff" camera.  I got it to take fishing and on the water instead of my more expensive cameras.  The quality of pictures, ease of use, and light weight are excellent.  I have not worked up to submierging it but I wanted something that would survive a dunking not take pictures of the Titanic.

Reviews.Title: What a picture perfect ,wet and wild cam and video device.
Reviews.Author: JEFFREY "JEFFD"
Reviews.Content: This item given as a gift made my wife and I Superstars in our sons eyes.He loves it.I am in qualty control all my working life and you can not beat this device for the $ spent and the insane quality of the product and its resulting pics and vids.Thank you FUGI.Jeff and Jill Dobrowolski

Reviews.Title: Exceeded my expectations
Reviews.Author: CsideSam
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera prior to going to Hawaii.  I knew I would be snorkeling and was looking for an economical underwater camera.  I am not a photographer, so I just wanted a basic point and shoot camera that was idiot proof, and would work underwater.  The camera is very portable - it fits comfortably in your pocket - and image quality is very good. It's a good all around camera - takes good photos and video both in and out of the water.  The only minor complaint is battery life. I recommend buying a backup battery, and having it ready to go when you need it - not a big deal.  It has some limitations (3X optical zoom, can't zoom in video mode), but for the price I paid, I am extremely happy with it, and would recommend it to anyone looking for a basic, versatile camera with underwater capability.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Cathy DeBoer
Reviews.Content: This camera is perfect for my purpose.  I didn't really want to take underwater photos, I just wanted to be able to be swimming in the water and be able to take photos of people in the water.  The quality of the photos are great!  This camera is lightweight and easy to use.  (I made my own wrist strap out of cut noodles to keep it from sinking).  I definitely recommend this WP camera!

Reviews.Title: Fuji waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: Jack P
Reviews.Content: I bought this to take on a trip to Mexico.  It performed better than I expected.  Battery life is also good.  I got a spare battery from EBay for $5 and did not need it until the 5th day after about 100 photos were taken and viewed many times.

Reviews.Title: Best underwater camera for the money!
Reviews.Author: GA
Reviews.Content: I went on vacation to Cozumel, Mexico and wanted to have an underwater camera for snorkeling.  This camera took great photos and video.At first there is that concern that it won't do well underwater, but it really came through.  It has a large view screen but like any camera outdoors it was difficult to see the image, but after the second day, I got the feel for the camera and with the right angles I took great pics.  My sister and sister-in-law bought this camera also and we were all amazed at the quality of the photos and ease of use.  It takes beautiful pictures outside of the water also.  The only drawback is that it doesn't come with a flotation strap or a manual, you get a CD for the computer that wouldn't work on our computers.

Reviews.Title: Great Water Resistance So Far
Reviews.Author: Mary Note Law "Mary Note Law"
Reviews.Content: We got this camera to replace a Valo waterproof camera that filled with water & was destroyed first exposure to H20.  Wasn't sure whether to chance it again.  This camera takes fantastic video & still jpegs in the pool on a sunny day.  We brought it into the Altantic Ocean on the north-east coast, where the water is greenish-- darker than I've seen it in Florida.  The camera was not able to get images through the ocean.  However, because it's so water-resistant, we were able to get great shots of surfing & playing in the ocean, without worrying about the water damaging the camera.  The clarity is great, and the shutter speed is so fast that it really catches a spray or splash of water-- really cool as you see all the droplets fanned out, sparkling in the sun.Where this camera falls short is when lighting is low.  The flash is poor and when it is not bright and sunny the picture becomes grainy.  However, for catching water fun on camera, it was amazing.  If it is your only camera, you may find it frustrating with indoor and low light photography, but for a great, fun way to capture fun in the sun & water, it was fantastic.Another feature that we like is the rechargeable battery.  It does seem to run out of charge fairly quickly-- after 2 days of taking pictures & videos & reviewing them frequently, we needed to recharge.  But charging doesn't take too long-- maybe an hour (haven't actually timed it, tho), and it's so much fun to get those water shots.

Reviews.Title: The BEST purchase I made for vacation!
Reviews.Author: Janice W.
Reviews.Content: This was by far the best purchase we made for our tropical vacation! The picture quality is AWESOME! The camera takes pics pretty quickly. I used this on the beach, in the pool and in the pouring down rain... all pics turned out fantastic. It is well worth the money for this camera, I know other people who spent $350+ on waterproof cameras - but I think this was just what I needed for the pics we took. The pictures that "real users" have posted are exactly true; pics have total clarity even when fully submerged in water. The only small down side is the zoom - wish it would be a little more. A great little camera, Have Fun with it and Enjoy!!!

Reviews.Title: Did the job
Reviews.Author: JK in NY
Reviews.Content: Word of advice: don't use the flash underwater if there is a lot of plankton or other floating things in the water.  It ended up ruining a number of my pics.  Camera is good if the light is strong, and the video works ok, although I did have to color-correct the video afterwards.  Still, I was able to film whale sharks up close while swimming alongside them, and if you stay very shallow in clear water (less than 10 feet), you'll get satisfactory results.  About all you can expect from a camera in this price range.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: We've really enjoyed this for the price. Having it float would have been nice, but we got an inexpensive float from West Marine to attach to it.

Reviews.Title: Camera Leaked
Reviews.Author: Cameralover
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera knowing that water proof cameras can leak, and only expecting a year out of it.  The first time I had it in the water it worked fine.  Got home, uploaded pictures (quality was ok) and then we noticed that there was water leaking out of one of the buttons on the back.  A call to fuji later and I found out this wasn't normal.  That really stinks!  I'll try this one more time with a replacement, but after that I'm not sure what I'll do.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Rose Vanlangendonck
Reviews.Content: Takes great outdoor & underwater pictures. What I did not trully appreciate was the ability to take water videos.  From my kids in our pool to the log ride at six flags in Dallas.  That is a wonderful bonus that I did not expect.  Indoor pictures not good. Ok, but not good.  For outside it is totally wonderful.  Would recommend to all, as an outdoor fun in the sun camera.  FYI: when ordering this camera make sure you order an extra battery.  It might be our useage is more draining due to our video shots as well.

Reviews.Title: First Class
Reviews.Author: H Thomson
Reviews.Content: When used as an underwater camera not only is this great fun but the picture quality is excellent, very good value.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Jenny Salyers
Reviews.Content: I spend my free time kayaking and this camera couldn't be better for the job.  I'm able to leave it out to catch wildlife photos with no concern about it getting splashed. Once the photos are posted on Facebook, I always get positive comments on the photos and the quality.  LOVE the camera!

Reviews.Title: Works like a charm!
Reviews.Author: Victor S
Reviews.Content: Was somewhat skeptical regarding the waterproof-ness of a digital camera, but it worked like wonders!  Was able to finally get away from the relatively expensive and not-so-great disposable water cameras that required processing.  This helped change the way I travel - it's light weight, easy to use, and takes decent underwater pictures!  So far no problems at all.  Well worth the money spent.

Reviews.Title: It's fine
Reviews.Author: T. Champion
Reviews.Content: It's fine for the purpose intended.  If I were looking for a really good camera, I would pick something else.  The construction is "cheaper" than what I expected.  But I do like that you can take two simultaneous pics - one with the flash and one without, so that you can pick the best one.  That is a great feature!

Reviews.Title: Sweet little deal
Reviews.Author: T. Hunt
Reviews.Content: SO far the cam works great.  It is tiny and yet produces some sweet pictures--very good quality.  I am a little apprehensive about testing its water tight capabilities, but seems air tight.

Reviews.Title: great little cam .. but 8 months later moisture goes into LCD
Reviews.Author: AnotherConsumer
Reviews.Content: I bought my Z33 for a trip to a beach in the philippines .. in rainy season ...It's a really neat little camera.  I miss the lack of image stabilization, but with that noted I was very happy with it in other respects, and it handled the water just fine until this weekend ...This weekend I took it to a water park, and after a full day of fun I noticed condensation inside the LCD display. I opened the battery compartment and it was completely dry inside, so that seal was just fine. And the camera still works fine .. just the LCD seems to have a problem.Sadly I am afraid to bring it underwater now ... so off to Fuji to test the after sales support :-)I still think its a great little camera for the money. I did get a lot of use out of it already .. under lots of cond

Reviews.Title: Excellent product!
Reviews.Author: Akneebreeated "Inebriated"
Reviews.Content: Fujifilm has created an excellent waterproof camera here. Its affordable and very durable. Ive used mine as a paddle while tubeing the rivers in the Texas heat, and its with held against the tough tides in the tropical Pacific surf.

Reviews.Title: Value for price
Reviews.Author: Naveen Kumar Nair
Reviews.Content: What more should you ask of a 100$ camera. Excellent design - waterproof - decent pictures - video ability.If you want to make this primary camera then go for high end camera. But, buy this one as a secondary camera to your Nikkon's to use in wet places.

Reviews.Title: water proof camera
Reviews.Author: Ann M. Stinsman "anniebabbles"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to go on a trip to a caribbean island , last year I bought disposable waterproof cameras and some of the pictures didn't come out, I rate this on regular use so far , we don't leave for our vacation til May , But I am sure it won't disappoint .The pictures I have taken and video are very clear and  it is fairly easy to use, had to get used to a new camera and what it does .I will be using it on my trip to snorkel so i am sure that since I won't be more that a couple feet under water it will do just fine for what I want it for.

Reviews.Title: Good daily shooter, ok underwater, slow shutter speed
Reviews.Author: JJ Man "JJ MAN"
Reviews.Content: We received this camera just before vaction and did not have enough time to get used to before using.  One piece of advise, purchase cameras well in advance of actually needing them in order to get acquainted with the functions.The shutter speed is too slow.  We lost many good shots underwater because of the shutter speed (1.5 to 2 seconds).. This may not seem like a long time, but for underwater shots, fish can swim 20' away in a couple of seconds or disappear all together.  Above water, pictures turned out fine.We did get some good underwater video in Cozumel.  The sun was shinning at that point and provided ampel lighting under water.  You cannot zoom while in video mode.  Nor does it have a light/flash that can be used like regular video cameras.  The videos are very clear.A second word of advise, buy a second battery.  I took about 60 pictures and 10 (30 second) videos on day one by the time the battery died.  Luckily, I took someone elses advise on this site and bought (even remembered to charge it too) another battery.Overall, we like this camera for its size, quality and value for the price ($139).  It far exceeds the quality of the throw-away underwater cameras and has good video capabilities.  If you are looking for Jacque Cousteau quality underwater pictures, plan to spend a couple of grand.  However, for the price, you can't beat the output.

Reviews.Title: Good Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Great price for a water resistant camera.  Good size that fits easily in a pocket.  Good pictures for point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Richie P. "Rhodes"
Reviews.Content: I read a lot of reviews on this camera and they certainly were mixed. I ended up deciding to try this camera and so far I am not disappointed at all. It's versatility is great! I haven't had it long so I can't comment on it's durability. I bought it to take on a caribbean cruise to make use of it's waterproof feature. For the price of this camera I can't complain about it at all. It takes good quality pictures out of the water and I also got some great pictures under water as well. I went swimming with dolphins and manatees. I just fired the camera under water and started clicking off shots. I got a couple of great under water shots without even being able to see what I was shooting at. It was really kind of fun. Being a digital camera, if I didn't like the picture, all I had to do was delete it! Putting the camera under water and pointing up to surface really created some great effects in the images. It also has a video feature that worked great as well. I would use this camera during the day, take it back to my cabin, dry it off and download the pics right to my computer. I haven't played with the different settings so far, but the auto feature actually works quite well. I have no complaints about this camera so far.

Reviews.Title: Good Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: Wailing E. Quist "quistwe"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift after using someone else's camera. He demonstrated its waterproofness by dunking it into my water glass in a restaurant. Of course, I didn't know it was waterproof at the time. haha He took it out and continued taking picture the rest of the night. The quality of the pictures were good and the camera is smaller than my cellphone and is very light weight. So, it would be very easy to carry around in your pocket. It is very user friendly and has a lot of picture modes, even one for "ebay" which takes 3 pictures and makes it into one collage.

Reviews.Title: love this camera!
Reviews.Author: A. Kidwell
Reviews.Content: So glad I bought this camera to take on a cruise with excursions involving water.  Never had a problem with battery life. Just took the charger on the trip and charged it every night.  Used the camera for 1.5 hrs while snorkeling.  Pictures are great.  Although, they do not appear great on my computer, but once printing on a machine at CVS and using the "Restore Color" option they are unbelievable.  Picture quality out of water are just as great. Make sure there is no water on the lens though when out of water of you will have spots on your image.

Reviews.Title: under water camera
Reviews.Author: Priscilla Shelto "P Shelton"
Reviews.Content: This camera is GREAT !!!It takes exellant pics and video, its a must to have.Takes great pics on land as well

Reviews.Title: Great little portable camera
Reviews.Author: Yon Yon "Yon Yon"
Reviews.Content: This was purchased for my father to take with him while boating.  He stated that it took very good pictures and was easy to use.  Of course, that comes from someone who has own numerous Finepix cameras.  He is very pleased with the product.

Reviews.Title: Purchased as gift
Reviews.Author: L. Purcell
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for brother-in-law who loves to go kayaking.  He needed something somewhat small and definitely something waterproof.  As soon as he opened it he went ON AND ON about just how cool it looks!  He loved the color (green) and the size of the screen, the easy set-up, etc.  He has mentioned that it takes awesome pictures and it's one of the best gifts he's received.  He can't wait to use it in the water!!

Reviews.Title: FinePix Z33WP
Reviews.Author: R. Gilley "Crazy Ray"
Reviews.Content: This camera could have a little better picture quality. It does ok in good lighting. Cloudy day or inside pics are very grainy.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Allison
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my boyfriend for Christmas and he brings it everywhere! He loves it! I suggest getting a memory card for it and your good to go :) !He had a problem installing the software, it keeps giving him an error message but other than that its great, you can connect to the computer minus the software.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Michael Davis "Michael"
Reviews.Content: My wife bought this camera for me at Christmas, and I love it.  It takes great pictures and video, I haven't used it underwater yet but plan on it this summer.  We have also booked a cruise later this yr to Mexico and I plan on using it while snorkeling. :-)

Reviews.Title: Perfect Outdoor Camera
Reviews.Author: SmartOne "SmartOne"
Reviews.Content: I was hesitant to buy this Camera based on some really bad reviews out there, but also some good. I decided to take a chance because of the cost and I am glad I did. I figure most people are more likely to write a review if they have bad luck with an item so that's most likely the reason you see mostly bad. When literally tens of thousands or more of a product are sold their is always some bad apples, but mine is great. The design is easy to grip, and it will fit in your back pocket. I have taken around 400 pictures with mine so far, most being underwater around 4 to 8 feet and I was pleased with the clarity of the prints, especially ones taken in a pool. I have had it submersed with the floating Lanyard and forgot about it for hours. No problem. I have also taken indoor shots and they as well look as good as any point and shoot Cameras I have owned that have cost more. The only drawback I can think of is the fact that you have to remove the battery to charge it, but I realized it would be next to impossible to have a waterproof charging port on it so it is just a must. The key to making sure you never have a leak problem I figure must be to make sure before you close the battery door, that the gasket is not dirty, sandy or otherwise not clean since most gaskets would leak if a consistent pressure wasn't applied all around. Also make sure that it clicks, indicating it is securely closed. The only thing I would suggest is the optional High Capacity Battery to take along if doing a lot of video since it uses a 120v. wall charger. All in all, it is a very good Camera regardless of it's low price and I would suggest it to anyone wanting an inexpensive Point & Shoot Camera even if they didn't intend to take it underwater just for it's water resistance alone.

Reviews.Title: Me gusta
Reviews.Author: J. Javier Sanmartin Godoy "jojasago"
Reviews.Content: No la he usado mucho aun, pero me gusta su portabilidad y su capacidad "waterproof"

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: G. Chambers
Reviews.Content: The camera is very easy to use, small easy to carry, and the pictures are great. I spend a lot of time on the river and wanted a camera that could get wet. I don't think you could find a better waterproof camera for the money. I recommend the accessory kit that goes with it.Fujifilm Z33WP Accessory Kit

Reviews.Title: She loves it!
Reviews.Author: Adrian W. Rosehill
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our daughter as a Christmans gift ~ she wanted an underwater camera ~ so far so good.  She and her friends have taken a lot of fun pictures with it. Quality is good.

Reviews.Title: Compact underwater camera with realistic results
Reviews.Author: Chloe Smith
Reviews.Content: Let me start by saying that I did not expect professional high res images from this little camera. I expected good underwater digital pictures that are better than the ones in a disposable underwater camera (also $$$ to get developed).I used it on vacation in Hawaii for snorkeling in the ocean, swimming in pools, on whale watching boats, catamarans, in waterfalls and it held up very well!Some pictures come out slightly blurry if you move while taking them, but most of the images were great. Also, with some minimal photoshop editing any lighting/color issues can be fixed easily.As others mentioned the stiff picture button makes it is hard to tell if the picture was taken underwater sometimes. It was not a big deal and it was portable enough to bring everywhere.I bought this Pentax floating wrist strap and it was much smaller and easier to use than the one meant for this camera. Pentax Floating Wrist StrapEveryone kept asking where they could get one! I'd definitely recommend it for any water activities, especially on vacation.

Reviews.Title: Kids' new toy
Reviews.Author: M. Conner "First time driver in Europe"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for one of the kids for Christmas.  This has become one of their favorite toys.  They love going to the pool and taking pictures of themselves underwater.  They can't wait until summer to try it at the lake & the beach.  Pictures turn out well.  The only drawback so far is the shutter delay.  Your subjects can move before the picture is taken.

Reviews.Title: Fuji in pink
Reviews.Author: Philip W. Knopp "gadgetman"
Reviews.Content: Gave this to my granddaughter for Christmas...she likes pink. And the camera performs pretty well. She likes swimming a lot, so having a waterproof camera seemed to be the right solution. I put a 4 Gig SD card in it, and it will take hundreds of pictures before running out of space. It fits her hand, and with a floating strap she can use it in the pool without a worry.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: JF
Reviews.Content: I got it for my 6 yr old. She takes wonderful pictures with this camera.Very easy to use. Good quality pictures. Most importantly, it's pink!

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for!
Reviews.Author: Rick Garner "Finzleft"
Reviews.Content: This is just what I wanted.  A relatively inexpensive little underwater camera that takes very decent photos, is easy to use, easy to carry, and even does great video.  I was headed to Tahiti and Bora Bora, and HAD to have something like that for the trip.  It easily paid for itself in the savings from my old 35mm underwater camera's costs for film and development, as well as allowed me to go crazy and snap away like mad.  I got some great underwater photos of sharks, rays, and the coral reefs.

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE CAMARA
Reviews.Author: David Bisono
Reviews.Content: TIENE BUENA RESOLUSION.  ES DE PERTENENCIA DE BETHEMIT Y EL ME COMENTO QUE LA IMAGEN ES EXCELENTE.  DEBAJO DEL AGUA AHY ES QUE ELLA ES FUERTE, MEJOR QUE MUCHAS DE LAS MARCAS DE RENOMBRE EN EL MERCADO.  RECOMIENDO ESTA WATERPROOF.

Reviews.Title: Decent Camera
Reviews.Author: D. Davis
Reviews.Content: I bought this Fuji camera after I lost my Canon SD1000 (which I really liked).  I didn't want to spend almost $300 for another one of those.  I bought this one while at the PX in Iraq, so I kinda overpaid what it is selling for here but that's ok.  Beggars can't be choosers.  That being said, I am being choosy.  This camera is good for outdoor daytime photos.  It does not do so well indoors in low lighting or at night.  The pictures come out blurry or not as crisp as you would expect from a good megapixel camera.  The lag time it takes to get a photo is infuriating.  You have to press the shutter and hold the camera still for about 2 seconds before the shot is captured.  This is not a good camera for live action shots, like moving kids and pets or sports.The buttons are simplistic and easy to figure out.  I enjoy the fact that the camera is waterproof and rugged.  I am going to give it to my husband for his fishing adventures.  But I am going to buy a Samsung Dualview TL225 next, it seems much more fun and creates better photos than this camera.  So in the end, this camera is great for rugged outdoor watery fun, but it wouldn't be my first choice in digital cameras if you know the quality of better Canon point and shoots or SLRs.  Great camera for beginners.

Reviews.Title: Great small camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Nicole D. Walling "Nicki"
Reviews.Content: I just got this camera a week ago and i love itt!! at first I thought it was pretty small and i may not like that but i love it... it takes great pictures.. i love that it comes with a rechargable battery rather than having to use AA batteries..The only thing I wish it would have come with is a case- but they arent that expensive so i will probably get one in the future...cant wait to use it in the summer for the pool and beach! I would recommend this camera to anyone- unless you do not like small cameras.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: hazzmatt
Reviews.Content: this is a strong camera.. i dropped it within the first 24 hours i had it. still worked.. took it on vacation to florida with me .. i had the camera in the pool and the ocean with no problems at all. the quality of some of the pictures differ from one setting to another. the camera for the price is way worth it.. if you take a lot of pictures you are bound to get a bunch that are fantastic..

Reviews.Title: works underwater, but
Reviews.Author: Swift Turtle "Swift Turtle"
Reviews.Content: Its not the best quality lens I guess, although it works well underwater. the above water  vacation shots are about the quality of a 2 megapixl old camera.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Mallissia Binschuslucas
Reviews.Content: I got this camera to take on vacations to play at the beach and such without worrying about it.  I took it on a cruise and the pictures turned out great!  The colors were amazing.  For the price and not to worry about if it gets wet or something this is a great camera for the price.  I also took one of the pictures and blew it up to an 8x10 and put it in a frame in my house and I get more wow that is a great piture!  I could go on and on about the camera but I just wanted to give my 2cents...  (I have the blue one)

Reviews.Title: Cute and portable but poor images
Reviews.Author: Jason Grubb "playstation 2"
Reviews.Content: I give this  a lower star rating due to the cameras in abilty to take great pictures in any lighty. i tried all various styles of lighting including underwater but style dissatissfied. Altough i loved how small and compact it was as well as the layout of the buttons which were simple and easy to use , a big plus underwater. The price is i say maybe $20 too high for the quality of the pics which really is the end reason why you want a camera. I just ordered the canon d 10 and have read many more favorable reviews on it unlike this camera.

Reviews.Title: Good camera at the right price
Reviews.Author: Niki R. "Globe Trekin"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera (from Amazon) back in June along with the accessories pack (from Beach Camera in NJ ) and have had it in the pool and on the Chattahoochee while tubing with friends. The accessories pack is highly recommended as it comes with the silicone sleeve, floating wrist strap and a useless camera case.I really don't have much to complain about the camera itself since it functions exactly as advertised and it is NOT my primary camera. There is no manual view finder on this camera, so you are totally relying on the LCD screen which does not function that great on a really sunny day... Under water... it works fine. Battery life is average... I shot 90+ images wet/dry before I got the warning light.It does look and feel a bit fragile, but as long as you are not planning to shoot it out of a cannon, or dive down to more than 10ft, then this is a good inexpensive purpose built camera to consider... (Color is another issue on to itself... who came up with puke green?!?!).

Reviews.Title: Good but not great!
Reviews.Author: S. Cho "stevemeister"
Reviews.Content: It does what it suppose to do, but Picture quality of Canon or Lumix is better.

Reviews.Title: Impressive
Reviews.Author: L. Harris "Phenatic Mom"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my 13 year old daughter. I figured waterproof was one less worry for her to ruin it. The camera has proven to be very durable and tons of fun. She went away this summer for vacation and came back with wonderful video of her and her cousins jumping off rocks and into the lake. The picture quality is the also great, and I would definately recomend this as an inexpensive waterproof camera. In fact, I'm thinking of getting one in a different color for myself.

Reviews.Title: good underwater camera
Reviews.Author: Jemalie Joyce Barrios
Reviews.Content: I bought this product because we were planning to go to a water park and I really wanted a waterproof camera. I did a lot of research and this camera is good for basic users who just needs a simple waterproof camera. It takes good underwater pictures which is why I really liked this camera. The only thing I don't like is when you take outdoor pictures coz the quality is not that good if you compare it to sony or canon. All in all, this is a good camera if you're gonna use it mainly in water.

Reviews.Title: Great Waterproof Camera for the Money
Reviews.Author: Richard L. Sauter
Reviews.Content: I Bought this camera for a 8 day backpacking trip to the High Sierras East of Fresno, CA. The Camera worked great in both dry and wet, in fact it shot good pictures and Video during several thunder storms. I had not intended to test the camera's waterproofness in this way but I had the camera in my pocket when I had to swim about 200 yrds in a extremely cold mountain lake. The camera worked great only had to clean the lense off since even little water droplets show up on the pictures or video...

Reviews.Title: Sweet deal!
Reviews.Author: Jair Lee
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera with the intention of taking pictures and video while surfing. On its first trial it performed really good!. I must say that I feel like my Canon SD600 has better picture quality at only 6MP, but can't go underwater without a housing, which it would be too bulky to snug under my wetsuit. So if you want the most bang for your buck, this is the right camera for you.

Reviews.Title: Best little camera ever
Reviews.Author: S. Schroeder
Reviews.Content: This little guy packs a big punch. I bought this with the accessory kit and with an extra battery. I highly recommend this as an underwater camera. We recently took some awesome shots in Hawaii. the video underwater is an added bonus. Shots came out pretty clear and there was no motion blur. I used this camera mainly for underwater purposes, but it takes decent, not the greatest everyday pics. The ease of use and speed that this can shoot is why I gave it 5 stars. Would recommend the floating strap and an extra battery for warmer climates. Also would only get a green or pink in case you drop under water for easily seeing it.

Reviews.Title: Not so great
Reviews.Author: J. Young "Gameface"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take fishing but after taking hundreds of pictures with it trying to get a decent shot I gave up and sent it back. The pictures were just too grainy. I compared photos taken with this camera and my 8 year old 4MP Cannon Powershot G4 and the old 4MP camera took better pictures every time. I guess these little point and shoots just aren't for me.

Reviews.Title: It works well underwater
Reviews.Author: Major Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My 12 year old bought this and she loves it.  Works great in water conditions and under water.  It's a bit slow on the shutter so there are absolute trade-of's from other digital cameras.  This is a great UNDERWATER camera but only a so-so DRY camera.  But the kids love it at the pool and beach.

Reviews.Title: Great underwater (only)
Reviews.Author: E. Jaicks "river rat"
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great photos and videos underwater, yet when it comes to any other setting, the photos are far less than satisfactory.

Reviews.Title: great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Rachelle Calkins
Reviews.Content: I just got back from a trip to Belize, I'd purchased this camera and it has more than paid for itself!!  You get a really easy to use, nice quality camera for a really good price, and it's waterproof, you can't beat that!  We had it out snorkeling for 3 separate trips and had no troubles with it at all, we got some pretty awesome pictures.  We also took it hiking and river tubing and had absolutely zero problems with it.  It's a great little camera that takes great little pictures.  Absolutely worth the buy!!the pros:takes good quality pics in and out of the watereasy to usedigitalthe cons:slower shutter speed, but it's really not an issue, it still worked great for fish pics

Reviews.Title: Great for underwater pictures
Reviews.Author: Leigh Law "photo printer"
Reviews.Content: I just got back from vacation and took tons of pictures in and under the water.  They are great!  In the outdoor light the pictures are so vivid and clear.  Inside they are a little grainy but I did not buy in for indoor use really.  It does what it is suppose to do - take great underwater pictures.

Reviews.Title: Money well spent on stylish little camera
Reviews.Author: S. Hylton
Reviews.Content: I got the camera because it was small and waterproof. Yes the indoor quality is not great if you don't play with it for a while but once you learn the camera's settings it is a decent little camera; over all it does take better outside photos. The size is very small but it has a large screen, easily fits in a pocket. I really wanted a waterproof camera but could not stomach spending over $300, so the price was a big factor. Since I already have a good Olympus camera (it's bulky) I decided that my older camera can be my indoor formal camera. Since I will be headed down to Disney, I wanted a nice little camera I could carry around and use without fear of it breaking on water rides. Money well spent on a stylish little camera.

Reviews.Title: Good (not great) outdoor camera
Reviews.Author: Rebecca L. Sullivan
Reviews.Content: The professional reviews for this were quite promising (I bought this when it first came out), but I have been mostly disappointed in the image quality.  Don't even think of taking indoor pics unless it is very well lit.  Focus takes longer than my older Olympus, recovery time is a tad long too (and doesn't improve a lot when on lower quality).Outdoor shots are a mixed bag. . . some are good, some are bad but none are great. . . about as good as a disposable 35 mm.  I haven't used any other waterproof camera, so I can't compare.  I do wish it were crisper at least under full sunlight. . . it would make the purchase a little less painful.

Reviews.Title: Green Waterproof Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Carrie Baxter
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my trip to Hawaii.  It worked as well as I expected.  It was a difficult see the screen underwater to see what I was about to take a picture of and then to know if it was focused.  If your are swimming for a while with it, you may want a strap to keep it around your neck or shoulder.  The wrist strap is not the easiest to swim with.

Reviews.Title: This was a gift from my husband, before Italy Trip
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I received this camera as a gift with the kit. Amazon and UPS delivered the camera on time and in one piece. The Fuji Z33WP is compact, lightweight and really cool. The pictures and video and software are great. I love the floating strap and silicon case. And I think the battery charging system is compact and flexible.

Reviews.Title: great camera for the field
Reviews.Author: Stafford A. Buchanan "staffordbuchanan"
Reviews.Content: I am a 2nd Lt. in the Marine Corps and I needed a camera to take to the field. I needed something that was durable, waterproof, and small. This camera was a perfect choice! The only qualm I have is with the battery life. However, the picture quality makes up for this. All in all, this is a great camera.

Reviews.Title: great little water camera
Reviews.Author: camera lover
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take on a cruise because I wanted something that I could take to the beach and snorkling etc.  It was perfect - the size is great and the pictures are actually better than I even expected them to be.  For the size it is a great value I would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: A total shocker
Reviews.Author: Samantha Gloeckner
Reviews.Content: This was a present from my parents for christmas because we have boats and go in the water a lot. I was so excited to use it in the water and the first couple times I was really impressed. I agree with some of the reviews that the quality of pictures are not stellar, but whatever it was only 170 so you're paying for the underwater option and shouldn't be complaining. Anyways, today, I was in salt water in the gulf of mexico and I turned my camera on after putting it down to swim for a while and it electrocuted me! I couldn't believe it! I'm calling fuji film tomorrow, but be warned. Probably not a good toy for kids!!!

Reviews.Title: DUD
Reviews.Author: Robert W. Good "WOODY"
Reviews.Content: We received the camera promptly, charged the battery and put it in the camera and it would not turn on.We talked to Fuji, they said to send it in, they explained that if it was covered under warranty we would get a refurbished camera. We have sent it back to Fuji and have been waiting for a reply. It seems the best outcome at this time is a used camera for a new one.

Reviews.Title: unusable
Reviews.Author: abcde
Reviews.Content: The camera was defective from the outset: it emitted a clicking noise and the image pulsed.  Be warned!

Reviews.Title: Bad indoor shots. Water shots fine
Reviews.Author: ila
Reviews.Content: I recommend the supplier. PORTABLE GUY.I was about to leave the country and His delivery was great.Shots in water are fine. But indoor shots are very noisy. I guess you get what you pay for. Cheap camera, good for the purpose its made for .Under Water.

Reviews.Title: CHECK REVIEWS B4 BUYING
Reviews.Author: M.W "blue giant"
Reviews.Content: Just after a year that I bought this camera (I only use it a few times in the summer), it started to make some strange noises everytime that it's turned on. I hope that this is not an indication that it's going to die in any moment. I bought it for the waterproof feature which is ok, but this camera is not good for indoor pictures.

Reviews.Title: Odd Safety Warning for a "waterproof" camera
Reviews.Author: B. Staehle "BruceS"
Reviews.Content: Although the camera is sold as waterproof, the "Important Safety Insructions" that are packed with it offer this interesting quote: "Do not use this video product near water - for example near a bath tub, wash bowl, kitchen sink, or laundry tub, in a wet basement, or near a swimming pool, and the like."At least they don't tell me not to take it out on the lake in my kayak.

Reviews.Title: Very cheap plastic cover.
Reviews.Author: B. Jensen
Reviews.Content: I believe the intentions were good for this camera. It does do well in its own realm, which is the outdoors with lots of light.  The video does really well also.  Indoors with little light creates terrible pictures.  Only use this for outdoors.  I gave it two stars because the lid for the battery compartment is plastic (unlike the rest of the camera) and it broke on me in my pocket rendering it useless in the water. Could they have spent a few more dollars to make it all metal and a lot more durable?  I think so...

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: Rocky Moutain Gal
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace a fuji waterproof camera that I take fly fishing regularly.  I purchased it based on reviews that said it was a good camera for the price and solid.  I was SO disappointed in the quality of the pictures - very grainy and fuzzy no matter what settings I tried.  I returned it after 1 week of trying to take pics on my vacation but coming home with lousy shots.Too bad - I liked everything else about it.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working the first day of our trip
Reviews.Author: Sue
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera 3 days before a Girl Scout trip.  The kids spilled milk on it right out of the box so I was glad that it was water proof-I just rinsed it off.  On the first day of our trip the girls were in a 6 ft deep pool, so I let them take it for a few pictures.  After the second shot the camera went dead.  I thought maybe it was the battery so I recharged it and tried the next day, but it was dead-no sign of water in the main housing, so I'm guessing there was some small leak near the switches.  I spent the rest of the trip borrowing other girls cameras.  Very disappointed.. The reason I rate it as high as a 3 is because the few pictures it took came out very well.  It just wasn't sturdy enough for me.  Rather than go through the repair process I just returned it to Walmart.  The Canon waterproof camera is more expensive, but looks like a sturdier camera-that will probably be my next purchase.

Reviews.Title: Finepix Z33WP camera
Reviews.Author: Michael Nguyen "photo writing"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for about a week now.  Took it out taking pictures of people, flowers, building..and these are my opinions.  Pictures has more noise if you take them in "Auto" mode, if you set it according to situations, the resolution will be sharper.Yes, I would the camera along on vacations where I expect to be near/in the water.  In the scale of 10 for quality pictures, I would give this camera an 8.  The videos is quite smooth (not jerky either).  Good enough to keep for vacation memories.  If the camera holds up well to the elements, this probably will be a the camera that I carry with me anywhere.  Will let you know in a few more months of using it.Costco has the best price.Update: just took this camera to go fishing for Father day with my kids.  This camera helped to capture the video of the kids catching their first fish.  It was exciting.  I would recommend this camera.  Video was clear.Pictures were good enough for non-professional daily use.Update2: Took this camera to Hawaii twice once in 2009 and again 2010, took video underwater and pictures under water.  Result: Video was good, however, pictures were not very clear underwater.  You can see them here at photobucket to decide for yourself. [...]These pictures and video were taken at Captain Cook's Monument snorkeling site.Overall conclusion: I would give this camera a 7 over 10.  Good for water, kayaking,fishing etc trips.  But if you want to take sharp/beautiful pictures to publish or enter the contest, this camera will not likely to deliver that.  For $129 camera, I am expected this level of quality.

Reviews.Title: Blech!
Reviews.Author: Mariah Shill "Mimiwithkids"
Reviews.Content: My husband I bought this camera after our other fujifilm camera stopped focusing. I loved the old one and it took great pictures-so I thought lets stick to fujifilm finepix V10. My husband loved that it was waterproof and green.I have not only been disappointed with the picture quality, but the focus takes a really long time and switching from video to camera takes a lot longer as well. The camera also does not always focus as well as it should. Even when it is focused the picture may be fuzzy. If someone is moving in the background they will be blurry instead of being in a strange position. I would return it, but my husband still likes that it can be used underwater so I'll probably buy the same camera we had before for my use.I wold not recommend especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: hopeless,next to useless
Reviews.Author: J. Lassen "jack"
Reviews.Content: bought this product to go snorkling with my daughter and sharks at camden aquarium for her birthday gift.she took pictures,i took pictures,not one good shot out of 98.thank goodness the aquarium took pictures of us there,otherwise we would have nothing to show but ticket stubs. My daughter was so disapointed.Pictures were blury,out of focus,slow to take,Do not buy this product!!!!Fujifilm FinePix Z33WP 10 MP Waterproof Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Green)

Reviews.Title: good size, ok pictures, but it broke!
Reviews.Author: Jeff H. Vance "jeff"
Reviews.Content: (I gave it 2 stars to reflect the low price)I bought this camera for my 14 year old daughter for her birthday. She liked the looks, small size, and it being waterproof. I liked the price and hoped it would be ok. I read reviews here and dpreview . com, and accepted the fact that image quality would not be great, especially indoor/low light. It seemed like a good compromise camera. I never read about the Z33 being fragile.[updated 9-2-09: for some reason over half of my review was truncated]The short story is the camera fell out of my daughter's pants pocket and broke. From this 2 1/2 foot drop the battery cover had a small crack and there was even a smaller crack in the bolt hole where the 2 halves of the case bolt together. Unfortunately, no one noticed these cracks until too late. She took the camera underwater and after a few minutes it stopped working.I called Fujifilm US support and they said it was not warranted against dropping at all, and their site makes no such claim. They told me that for approx $80-$100 plus postage I could mail the one week old camera to them and they would try to repair it, but no guarantee it could be fixed. I declined this offer and now wish that I had purchased the more expensive Pentax W-60, which is on sale these days for a great price. My youngest daughter has that model and it has survived almost a year now!Photo images: with strong contrast post adjustments you can get acceptable underwater photos.[update: 17 Nov. 2009]I am sure impressed with Amazon and will continue to buy from them! My daughter sent an email to Amazon telling them what happened, the camera broke, Fujifilm won't replace it, etc. Amazon replied in a few days telling us that we could return it for a full refund. Fortunately I saved the original shipping box, but we got really busy for a month+ and forgot about it. A few weeks ago we sent the camera back with a note apologizing for being so late in returning it, and in less than 1 week we received in the mail a full refund credit at Amazon. Thanks!Now what do folks think of the new Pentax WS80? (I won't be buying the Fujifilm Z33 again.)

Reviews.Title: Terribly quality photos!!
Reviews.Author: Mom of 2 "Michelle B"
Reviews.Content: I am by no means a photographer...I do have 2 toddlers and do enjoy trying to take quality shots of them. I bought this camera to replace my Olympus Stylus 770 which recently died (the waterproof camera suffered water damage...go figure). So I try to put my SDHC memory card in and it won't work. So I use the internal memory to take a few pictures of non-moving objects (the sleeping cat, kitchen table, bed)...just 'stuff' to try out the camera. The shutter speed is SLOW. Like the slowest camera I've ever seen. Every single photo I snapped was blurry beyond recognition. I immediately returned this product. I was really dissapointed because the price was good but I guess you get what you pay for.Luckily I had some gift cards come my way and I have a Canon D10 on order. Hopefully that's as good as the reviews say

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera
Reviews.Author: Cathleen Barnish
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera.  So far, the pictures are turning out great.  I haven't had the chance to use it in the water yet, but I'm looking forward to that.  The only down side is that I wish it had a little more zoom, I didn't realize I'd miss it.  I was confused by the battery a little at first... I thought it didn't work.  It looked like it was in right, but I had to flip it around to get it to work.

Reviews.Title: Don't drop it, unless it's into water
Reviews.Author: steven wanke
Reviews.Content: The case cracked at the battery compartment cover after a two foot fall from my lap to a gym floor at my kid's violin concert. It's ok though, because it took crap pictures anyhow. I expect more from Fuji cameras.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm FinePix Z33WP 10 MP Waterproof Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Black)
Reviews.Author: MAURICIO CASTRO MONGE
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because y love mountain bike and needed a camera that could be used in rainy days.For the above purposes it's a very good camera. I took very nice pictures in exteriors, but pictures in interiors (with low light conditions are very grainy).

Reviews.Title: nice but i cant do clear pics under water
Reviews.Author: Mar "Marinera"
Reviews.Content: i cant do those pics like the ones i see of the little boy under the water, why? what am doing wrong?its a a swimming pool clear water.the rest its good. but make sure there is no figer prints then pics will come blurry.

Reviews.Title: didnt last long!
Reviews.Author: Robyn Hidalgo "robyn"
Reviews.Content: I had the camera for 2 months and water got into it, no worth the extra money.why buy a water proof camera that cant get wet? sent it back to co. they "cleaned" it?

Reviews.Title: terrible picture quality
Reviews.Author: Catherine Sheer "Catherine"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as an alternative to the olympus stylus because I wanted a small underwater digital camera. However, after having an olympus for 3 years, this camera was a major letdown. Out of 20 pictures I take, maybe one or two would turn out nicely. There was an incredible amount of image noise. The flash made almost everything washed out, but if I turned the flash off, the images would ALWAYS be blurry - even on the no blur mode - and a bit green-tinted.This is probably one of the most inexpensive waterproof cameras, but with the amount of wasted shots it takes, it's really worth a few extra dollars to get a camera that produces pictures worth looking at.

Reviews.Title: Best camera ever!
Reviews.Author: Brett A. Smith
Reviews.Content: This camera is not only adorable but easy to use, takes great photos. The best photos are actually taken in the ocean! A must for any vacation lover!

Reviews.Title: not waterproof
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Ketchum
Reviews.Content: The first time we used the camera there was condensation on the lens.  It's possible we got a bad camera just by luck.  The manufacturer refunded most of my money, but I forgot and left in the memory card ($18.00) and returned it with the camera.  That was not refunded.  Not the greatest experience overall.

Reviews.Title: Arrived Broken
Reviews.Author: mich
Reviews.Content: camera would not turn on (power up) when received.  tried a couple of batteries (yes, they were charged).  poor quality control.  had to return.  waiting to see what they'll do for me, if anything.  :-(

Reviews.Title: My 14-year-old loves this camera
Reviews.Author: NC mom
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a Christmas present for my 14-year-old.  So far, it does everything it says it does.  She has taken pictures and taken videos under water.  It worked.  No leaks yet.  Seems easy for her to operate.It's still operating so given that it's probably made in China, I guess that's worth something.  Ask me in a year.

Reviews.Title: Great little beach camera
Reviews.Author: Katrhyn M. Gron "Kasiact"
Reviews.Content: This camera has everything you might need for a beach/lake trip.  I originally got it for a trip to the beach, but because I'm clumsy and drop cameras a lot I have to upgrade to the shockproof/waterproof.

Reviews.Title: gracias
Reviews.Author: Carlos Betancourt
Reviews.Content: gracias, aun me faltan varias cosas q no me an llegado pero este producto muy bueno

Reviews.Title: Low end Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: Karan L. Paulson "Perfectionist"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera and found it had poor picture quality compared to other point and shoots.  Also, the buttons on the back were very low end and much too small.Next I purchased the "New Nikon Cool Pix 12MP", what a fabulous camera.  Very fast shooting, outstanding picture quality and very easy to use.  No out of focus pictures with this camera, even when on the move. It also had a metal case and solid buttons on the back.The Nikon Cool Pix 12 MP is a perfect quality product all the way around.  Recommed spending a little more money for a "quality camera" which you will be happy with.I returned the Fuji FinePix to "Wall Street Photo" (had to pay my own return postage almost $8.00) and a 20% restocking fee which I was not aware of until after the fact.

Reviews.Title: Buena compra
Reviews.Author: Cecilia Paredes
Reviews.Content: El producto no lo he podido utilizar mucho ya que al segundo día de haberlo recibido salió una raya horizontal en el display. Me puse en contacto con el vendedor y me informaron que debia devolverla para realizar el cambio por una camara nueva. La atención fue excelente. Aparentemente es una falla en este tipo de display.

Reviews.Title: PQ very bad
Reviews.Author: Fahad M. Al Ansari
Reviews.Content: PQ is very bad in this camera i gave it to my kids to play with it they are so happy that they can wach under water

Reviews.Title: I like cup cakes
Reviews.Author: A. Ferdowsi "Sararararararaa"
Reviews.Content: I like this camera, but it broke.I like cup cakes.P.s.Stupid dumb boys broke my camera!!!!They are SUCH butt heads!! GOSH!!i bought another camera. it was an upgraded version of that one. I want the old one back. stupid boys.

ProductInfo.Features:
10.0-megapixel resolution for large, photo quality prints
Waterproof up to 10 feet
3x optical zoom; 2.7-inch LCD screen with Micro Thumbnail View
Blog Mode with 12 editing functions
50 MB built-in memory; capture images to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix Z33WP 10MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Green)
